languages.text: "Научи человека грамоте — получишь умного еретика" — так они говорят. А уж демонстрировать превосходство знаний над советами святых отцов и вовсе опасно для жизни".

"'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."
languages.original_text: "Научи человека грамоте — получишь умного еретика" — так они говорят. А уж демонстрировать превосходство знаний над советами святых отцов и вовсе опасно для жизни".

languages.text: "'Lehrt einen Mann das Lesen und ihr erschafft einen klugen Ketzer'. Ich glaube, das war eine der örtlichen Redensarten. Was den Nachweis der Überlegenheit des Wissens gegenüber dem Rat heiliger Ekklesiarchen angeht, tja ... diese Dummheit hätte mich tatsächlich das Leben kosten können."
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."

traits.locale_text: "'Lehrt einen Mann das Lesen und ihr erschafft einen klugen Ketzer'. Ich glaube, das war eine der örtlichen Redensarten. Was den Nachweis der Überlegenheit des Wissens gegenüber dem Rat heiliger Ekklesiarchen angeht, tja ... diese Dummheit hätte mich tatsächlich das Leben kosten können."

languages.text: « "Apprendre à lire à un homme, c'est réchauffer en son sein un hérétique éclairé"... Un dicton fort populaire dans la région à l'époque, si mes souvenirs sont bons. Quant à prouver la supériorité de la connaissance par rapport aux conseils des saints ecclésiastiques... ma foi, ce genre de coup d'éclat ne pouvait que mettre ma vie en danger. »
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."

traits.locale_text: « "Apprendre à lire à un homme, c'est réchauffer en son sein un hérétique éclairé"... Un dicton fort populaire dans la région à l'époque, si mes souvenirs sont bons. Quant à prouver la supériorité de la connaissance par rapport aux conseils des saints ecclésiastiques... ma foi, ce genre de coup d'éclat ne pouvait que mettre ma vie en danger. »

languages.text: «Uno de los refranes locales más repetidos es "Enseña a un hombre a leer y obtendrás un hereje cultivado". Y poner de manifiesto la superioridad del conocimiento por encima de las homilías de un santo eclesiarca... en fin, semejante insubordinación pudo haberme costado la vida».
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."

traits.locale_text: «Uno de los refranes locales más repetidos es "Enseña a un hombre a leer y obtendrás un hereje cultivado". Y poner de manifiesto la superioridad del conocimiento por encima de las homilías de un santo eclesiarca... en fin, semejante insubordinación pudo haberme costado la vida».

languages.text: 「『人に文字を教えれば、聡明な異端者を育てることになる』というのは、地元民に人気の格言の一つだったと思います。聖職者の助言に対して知識の優位性をひけらかすというのは、まあ…その種の背信行為が私の命を危険にさらすのは分かりきったことでした」
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."

traits.locale_text: 「『人に文字を教えれば、聡明な異端者を育てることになる』というのは、地元民に人気の格言の一つだったと思います。聖職者の助言に対して知識の優位性をひけらかすというのは、まあ…その種の背信行為が私の命を危険にさらすのは分かりきったことでした」

languages.text: “‘教会一个人读书，就相当于培养了一个聪明的异端分子。’我相信，这差不多算是当地人最喜欢的谚语吧。至于我，我证明了知识比牧师的神圣建言更加有效，怎么说呢……这已经足够要我的命了。”
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."

traits.locale_text: “‘教会一个人读书，就相当于培养了一个聪明的异端分子。’我相信，这差不多算是当地人最喜欢的谚语吧。至于我，我证明了知识比牧师的神圣建言更加有效，怎么说呢……这已经足够要我的命了。”

languages.text: "'Birine okumayı öğretirsen akıllı bir kâfir yetiştirmiş olursun.' diye iyi bilinen bir deyim vardı. İrfanın, kutsal ekleşiarkların tavsiyelerinden daha üstün olduğunu ortaya koymak... Bu tür bir başkaldırının hayatımı tehlikeye sokmaması beklenemezdi."
languages.original_text: "'You teach a man to read, you raise a bright heretic,' I believe was one of the favourite local sayings. As for demonstrating the superiority of knowledge over the advice of holy ecclesiarchs, well... that kind of defiance was sure to put my life at risk."
